person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Hungarian overnight interest rates closed higher on Friday as market liquidity tightened before the December 10 social security contribution payment deadline , dealers said .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| dealers |

The only person entity in the paragraph is "dealers". It is mentioned in the sentence "dealers said".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |

The paragraph does not contain any clear references to a person. The word "dealers" could potentially refer to a group of people, but it is not clear that it does so in this context. Therefore, there are no valid person entities in this paragraph.
